summary: Frontend testing PASSED - All custom equipment features verified. Custom radio 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' (key: cobra29ltdm) appears in dropdown and works with simulation. Variable current shows 3.4A/50A when keyed with 2-pill driver (0A when not keyed). Default radios remain available. Thermal simulation works with custom equipment.
passed_tests: Custom radio 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' appears in Radio dropdown - PASS
Custom radio specs correct: DEAD KEY 0.75W, PEAK 25W - PASS
Custom radio works with simulation: Signal chain shows Radio 0.75W -> Driver (+17dB) -> 38W output - PASS
All default radios present: Cobra 29 LTD (1W), Galaxy DX 959 (5W), Stryker SR-955HPC (8W), Connex 4300HP (10W), Ranger RCI-2970N2 (12W) - PASS
Variable current with 2-pill driver: DRAW shows 0A/50A when NOT keyed - PASS
Variable current with 2-pill driver: DRAW shows 3.4A/50A when keyed - PASS
Thermal simulation with custom equipment: Temp rises from 25° to 26° during keying - PASS
Default radio switching works: Ranger RCI-2970N2 (12W dead key, 40W peak) - PASS
Equipment API returns custom 'cobra29ltdm' with correct data - PASS
mergeEquipmentFromAPI() correctly transforms snake_case API data to camelCase - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: rfEngine.js mergeEquipmentFromAPI() correctly merges API equipment into hardcoded objects
RFContext.js fetches /api/equipment on mount and triggers re-render via equipmentLoaded state
EquipmentRack.js destructures equipmentLoaded to ensure dropdown updates after fetch
Variable current formula: actualCurrent = ratedCurrent * loadRatio (working correctly)
Thermal simulation uses load-based heating proportional to radio output vs amp capacity
seed_data_creation: Custom radio 'cobra29ltdm' already exists in DB (added via admin panel)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Custom equipment merge feature fully verified. Custom radio 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' (key: cobra29ltdm, dead_key: 0.75, peak_key: 25) appears in dropdown after login and equipment API fetch. Variable current shows ~3.4A/50A with 0.75W radio + 2-pill driver (loadRatio ~0.07). Thermal heating is slow due to low loadRatio. All default equipment remains available.
